item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 8:05, so let's meet inside the ticket lobby at 7:30. Then I'll buy everyone's ticket, and we can get snacks and head in.

Hope to see you for The Lightning Thief!

--D

OLD STUFF:
Okay, I'll admit it. I like kids' fantasy books. Especially when I read them and can get excited for the movie version! So let's all act like kids and go see The Lightning Thief!

SUMMARY:
It's the 21st century, but the gods of Mount Olympus and assorted monsters have walked out of the pages of high school student Percy Jackson's Greek mythology texts and into his life. And they're not happy: Zeus' lightning bolt has been stolen, and Percy is the prime suspect. Even more troubling is the sudden disappearance of Percy's mother. As Percy adapts to his newly discovered status as a demi-god (his father is Poseidon), he finds himself caught between the battling titans of Mt. Olympus. He and his friends embark on a cross-country adventure to catch the true lightning thief, save Percy's mom, and unravel a mystery more powerful than the gods themselves.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Percy Jackson and the Lightning Thief!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Percy Jackson and the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
